derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin geometra, based on Greek geōmetrēs, from gē 'earth' + metrēs 'measurer'

auth_sentence.content: There is scarce a Geometer, but has his own Method of Investigation.

auth_sentence.content: Mikhail Gromov, the Russian geometer, said that he understood Perelman's logic: To do great work, you have to have a pure mind.
